content: crochet basket inspiration ikea size as needed pattern is for rectangle size 16x14x6cm material holdovers of different yarns original is made from czech yarn katerina /60% cotton 40% acryl/ toptex crochet hook size 3 needle difficulty very easy pattern all basket is crochet only from single_crochet we start with 8 chains 1 row 1chain in each chain one single_crochet in last chain of row 5single crochet continue with single_crochet around other side in last chain of row make 4single crochet row ends with slip chain 2 row 1chain single_crochet and in the end of row where we have 5 single_crochet we crochet 1single crochet in first 2single crochet in second 1single crochet in third and 2single crochet in fourth 1single crochet in fifth continue with single_crochet and in the end of row repeat 1single crochet in first 2single crochet in second 1single crochet in third and 2single crochet in fourth row ends with slip chain 3 row now we have made four corners / they are made by two single_crochet in one single crochet last row/ 3 row and all next row start with chain /instead of first single_crochet/ and continue with single_crochet up to the 2single crochet in corner there still repeat 2single crochet when reach size our model has 16cm we stop making corners and crochet in row with single crochet when we reach 9cm / 3cm is roll edge / finish work with slip chain www e-pleteni cz
